content:
So I never published the design meetings for January because life. But I was looking at the notes and I saw we had planned to do

  • 2022-01-12 - enum repr/discr (owner: Felix)
  • 2022-01-19 - backlog bonanza (Felix is out)
  • 2022-01-26 - lang-team check-in (owner: Niko/Josh)

@pnkfelix did you prepare a doc for today?
I will try to post a blog post and so forth now
@Josh Triplett did this get discussed in triage meeting yesterday? :point_up:
Yeah. Or rather, @Jack Wrenn prepared a doc and I lightly editted it.
we skimmed over its state yesterday and agreed that we should have a meeting today
(which, in hindsight, seems like a really good idea going forward: it gave lang team members a chance to say “hey i’m not sure point X is addressed anywhere here."
(not that anyone said that in the meeting, but I’m just realizing that allocating a bit of skim time might make sense. Or maybe it can just be an optional thing people can do if they have time…)
